QueryResult.text: SELECT CMN_TIME_QUARTER_LABEL_FCT( L.LANGUAGE_CODE, T.HIERARCHY_LEVEL, T.PERIOD_KEY, T.QUARTER, T.YEAR) TIME_LABEL, CMN_TIME_QUARTER_LABEL_FCT(L.LANGUAGE_CODE,T.HIERARCHY_LEVEL,T.PERIOD_KEY, T.QUARTER, T.YEAR) QUARTER_LABEL, T.YEAR YEAR_LABEL, L.LANGUAGE_CODE, T."TIME_KEY",T."PERIOD_KEY",T."PERIOD",T."PERIOD_START_DATE",T."PERIOD_END_DATE",T."QUARTER_KEY",T."QUARTER",T."YEAR_KEY",T."YEAR",T."HIERARCHY_LEVEL",T."CREATED_DATE",T."CREATED_BY",T."LAST_UPDATED_DATE",T."LAST_UPDATED_BY" FROM CMN_LANGUAGES L, NBI_DIM_FISCAL_TIME T
